byline.original: By P.J. PHILIP Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Paris circles and press discuss value of Trondheim line and Narvik
snippet: PARIS, April 30--With that coolness of judgment that has always marked French military strategy, the question is being discussed here whether it is wiser to try to defend the Trondheim line in Norway and......

headline.main: PARIS RECONSIDERS OBJECTS IN NORWAY; Wonders if It Would Not Be Better to Abandon Fight, Except to Hold Narvik WIDE DEFENSE HELD RISKY It Is Argued Reich's Iron Could Be Cut Off Without War in Populous Centers
